nodes.title: Cloud Database Manager

product.summary: A open source object-relational database system
MySQL-a high reliable database management system
A scalable, high-performance, open source NoSQL database
SQLServer Express edition is the entry-level, free database

overview.overview: CloudBeaver is a web-based database GUI tool which provides rich web interface. You can use it to manage PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, SQL Server, Oracle, DB2, Firebird, H2, Trino

highlights: It is a web-based database GUI tool which provides rich web interface
Data export and migration in multiple formats

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged CloudBeaver Community with professional support for your business. CloudBeaver Community is a web-based database GUI tool which provides rich web interface. Server itself is a Java application, web part is written on TypeScript and React. You can use it to manage PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, SQL Server, Oracle, DB2, Firebird, H2, Trino.

faq.value: Yes, you can switch language online.

faq.key: Can I access CloudBeaver from other port?
faq.value: Yes, you need to modify Nginx vhost configuration file, and change server_name 's listen 80 to listen 8090 as sample
